channel.title: Adding 99
channel.description: can you give me the code so i can add a box that when you click you get 99 thieveing

item.title: Adding 99
item.dc:creator: @adrian1372 adrian1372
item.description:
@adrian1372 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Wrote this quickly, let me know if you get errors.

if (objectID == BOXID)
{
addSkillXP(13100000, 17);
}

Add that code in case 132 in client.java.[/quote]

Yea, just like that

Read full topic

item.title: Adding 99
item.dc:creator: @adrian1372 adrian1372
item.description:
@adrian1372 wrote:

Hmm, you can also set the xp rates for thieving much higher and make it like 1M X Runescape. That should get ur players 99 thieving in 1 thieve.

Making a 99 thieving command can also be done i think. So if u want a Box that gives u 99 thieve, its much easier to just set xp rates higher or make a thieving 99 command like: 99 or ::thieving or w/e

Read full topic
